card.name: Elsie and Iustus
card.text: Creatures you control have Soulbond. Paired creatures you control have +1/+1.

card.name: Askmunt, Wandering Sage
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness. Then, if that creature’s toughness is 5 or greater, draw a card.

card.name: Eremis, Magefire Interflux
card.text: {U/R}{U/R}: The next sorcery spell you cast has flash until end of turn.

card.name: Rogin, Heroic Ideal
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a level counter on it. {5}, {T}: Proliferate.

card.name: Fidys, Bane of Setessa
card.text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}.

card.name: Nikya the Insurmountable
card.text: At the beginning of the game, choose a number. When you attack with exactly the chosen number of creatures, creatures you control gain +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the chosen number.

card.name: Loew, Jealous Sculptor
card.text: At the beginning of the first upkeep, create a 3/3 legendary red Golem creature token named Shem. At the beginning of each end step, if you control a creature not named Shem, Loew, Jealous Sculptor deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Kochis the Infiltrator
card.text: Whenever a Snake you control deals damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Guard Captain
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, put a +1/+1 on that creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink and vigilance.

card.name: Helmburg, the Walking Fort
card.text: Fortify costs of Fortifications you control cost {2} less. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more fortified lands, draw a card.

card.name: Fate Destructor
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a purple Abomination creature token that has its power, toughness, and abilities. Purple permanents you control have the abilities of every other purple permanent.

card.name: Iris, Nephalian Magus
card.text: {1}{U}{B}{R}, {T}: Reveal the top three cards of your library and exile them. Discard a card, {T}: Cast an instant or sorcery exiled by Iris, Nephalian Magus without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Mobius
card.text: Whenever a permanent you control is exiled, you may pay {2}. If you do, exile target permanent that shares a card type with it.

card.name: Andemica the Loyal
card.text: Whenever a Human is put into the graveyard from anywhere, put a pledge counter on Andemica the Loyal. Remove 4 pledge counters from Andemica, {T}: Return target Human from the graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Climatine, Cloudsculptor
card.text: If an creature would deal damage to you and Climatine, Cloudsculptor is untapped, you may pay {3}{W}{U}, if you do, exile it, then return it to the battlefield under it’s owner’s control. {2}{W/U}, {T}: Exile target creature, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

card.name: Khimenta, Plague Vector
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are two or more creatures on the battlefield, move a -1/-1 counter from target creature to another target creature with the same controller.

card.name: Garu, Bone Weaver
card.text: Creatures assign combat damage equal to the greater of their power or toughness. If a creature with power or toughness 5 or greater you control would die, any opponent may pay {2}, otherwise target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Ugrumath, Phyrexian Vessel
card.text: {2}, {T}: Create a 0/2 Legendary Creature token named “Avatar of Ug'rumath” with “Avatar of Ug'rumath gains +1/+1 for each mana in your mana pool.”. While you control a creature named “Avatar of Ug'rumath”, colorless mana does not empty from your pool. {G}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

card.name: Emiran, Soul Ghoul
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 20 or more life, lose 1 life and create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. At the beginning of your upkeep,if you have 10 or less life, lose 1 life and create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Avalaro, Tenant of Nature
card.text: Creatures with power 5 or greater have menace and can’t block. Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library, then gain 2 life.

card.name: Ferromus, Deranged Purist
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if two or more colors of mana were spent to cast it, sacrifice it. If you do, Ferromus, Deranged Purist deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Aldema, Myr Matron
card.text: Myr spells you play cost {1} less. Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, you may pay {W/U}, if you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

card.name: Ayun, Scribe of the Void
card.text: When you detain a creature, you may draw a card or put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {3}{W}{U}, {T}: Detain target creature.

card.name: Bhadim, Baroness of Form
card.text: Face down cards you control have hexproof. Whenever you turn a card face up, you may pay {3}, if you do, you may turn another card face up.

card.name: Kerani, Illusionary Intruder
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deals combat damage to a player, create an creature token that's a copy of one of those creatures, except it is an illusion and has “Whenever this becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.”

card.name: Klein
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, flip a coin. If heads, counter that spell. If tails, that player copies that spell. That player may choose new targets for their copy. Whenever a player casts an artifact, creature, enchantment or planeswalker spell, flip a coin. If heads, counter that spell. If tails, that player creates a token that is a copy of the permanent that spell would become.

card.name: Pelemor, Patriarch of the Bereaved
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in your hand, you may skip your draw step. If you do, creature cards in your graveyard gain Unearth {X}{U/B} until end of turn, where {X} is the converted mana cost of the creature minus one.

card.name: Venoda of the Grand Guard
card.text: Whenever an opponent gains life, you may put a repentance counter on Venoda of the Grand Guard. Remove a repentance counter from Venoda: Creatures you control gain +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Yemnad, Oblivion Cabalist
card.text: Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, target player discards a card.

card.name: Lethe, Necrosavant
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may put target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard on top of your library, where X is that creature's power.

card.name: Elkeppan the Terrible
card.text: At the beginning of your first upkeep, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are the monarch, you may return target creature from your graveyard to your hand. Any player may pay 2 life to counter this ability.

card.name: Dyph, Obscrra Priestess
card.text: Pay 3 life, {B}{B}, {T}: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Fienshield, Malevolent Defense
card.text: Whenever you would sacrifice a creature, you may deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Flyne, Cultivator of the Meek
card.text: {G}{G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with power 3 or less. As you use this ability, you may pay {1} to have it target one more creature you control. Nontoken creatures you control with power 3 or less have "Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature, {G}{U}, {T}: Draw a card or Scry 2."

card.name: Mehmiqar, Essence Fiend
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters the battlefield under your control, put an essence counter on Mehmiqar, Essence Fiend. {T}, Remove two essence counters from Mehmiqar: Mehmiqar deals 1 damage to target creature or player. {T}, Remove three essence counters from Mehmiqar: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Pranam Thop Squad
card.text: Whenever an artifact creature deals combat damage, you may untap target creature. {R}{W}, {T}: Target Vehicle becomes a creature until end of turn.

card.name: Sperell, Mana Mender
card.text: {2}, {T}: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast has lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Tihun, Justicar Exile
card.text: Whenever you discard a card, put a rebel counter on Tihun, Justicar Exile for each card discarded. Remove four rebel counters from Tihun, {T}: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Unhalmen, Exsquisite Corpse
card.text: Whenever a Zombie enters the battlefiend under your control, place a +1/+1 counter on it. Remove two +1/+1 counters from target creature you control: Target creature has indestructible until end of turn.
